Desc.entry: Community centre hosting various activities, including parent and toddler group, dog training, acting group, bingo and social club, tap and ballet classes and folk group. Runs a social club, with lunch, on Tuesdays for people who are unemployed, mentally and physically disabled with access to computers, welfare information and social activities. Also holds a lunch club on Wednesdays for over 50s which supplies lunch and a chance to socialise (see separate entry). Has rooms for hire (see separate entry). Events include Christmas bazaar and nearly new sale. The centre also has a fully useable stage.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times); evening and weekend events, please contact for details

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 10
